It was very good, she had to have more. She had about seven more until her legs gave out. She looked at herself and realized it made her gain weight like crazy! She tried to stand up, but failed, she started to get worried. How was she going to get back to her friends?
Her massive ocean-like belly was grumbling loudly. So Gloria had more berries while she waited. After a few dozen more she was MASSIVE, her belly was her biggest asset but her ass was also pretty close as well. Then all of a sudden she-
